title: Ep 81: Our Spiciest Episode Yet
description:
Gather 'round the Yule Log and listen to this week's very special Double Holiday Special from the Judgies! We have an update from a past story on Lucy and her poly relationship, we read about a relationship on the rocks due to the Grinch, a mom skips her daughters "gender reveal" party, and a listener sends in their work drama and wants to know if they are the A-hole submits. Also Josh and Christian bring some very exciting things to celebrate Christmas and Pepper Pot day.
 https://www.bonfire.com/store/the-judgies-podcast/ 
Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out! https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod 
Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like) P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350 
Leave a Review! https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-judgies/id1519741238 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod
Intro Music by: Iván https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1 
Story Links: 
0:00 Intro

Gather 'round the Yule Log and listen to this week's very special Double Holiday Special from the Judgies! We have an update from a past story on Lucy and her poly relationship, we read about a relationship on the rocks due to the Grinch, a mom skips her daughters "gender reveal" party, and a listener sends in their work drama and wants to know if they are the A-hole submits. Also Josh and Christian bring some very exciting things to celebrate Christmas and Pepper Pot day.
